I can't believe people give this video/audio 9! The movie is excellent, definitely 10! But video is 4 and audio is 6. Download different torrents for this movie. E.g. 'The Fighter (2010) SCR XviD By MegaPlay'

Thanks for upload!

Although I must report in that it didn't met my usual expectations for a kingdom release.. This clearly is screener quality, and sadly far from a V/A10. What really annoys me though is the fuzzy distortion on the right side throughout the movie.  (White lightning-styled stuff that sparks up occasionally)

CTRL+E in VLC to bring out the options to crop out 2-3 pixel rows is how to fix it if you still want to download this release/already have.
I don't give a flying fuck if paramount is sending emails to people who download it. I'm not american anyway.
